Text: A community-led catchment management scheme has resulted in the planting of more 3,500 trees around Kanyera village over the course of the past decade.
Effect: the planting of more 3,500 trees around Kanyera village over the course of the past decade.
Sentence: <e1>A community-led catchment management scheme</e1> has resulted in <e2>the planting of more 3,500 trees around Kanyera village over the course of the past decade.</e2>
